gameDetails.name: Sheriff of Nottingham: Dice Tower 2016 Kickstarter Promo Pack
gameDetails.description:
2 promo cards (King's Decree and Gemstone) which were available as a reward for the 2016 Dice Tower Season 12 Kickstarter.

King's Decree: If King's Decree is in a bag with only one other legal good and it is checked, the sheriff must pay 15 gold as a penalty.

Gemstone: A rare gem can only be taken in a bag with a total of two items, you must reveal the gem after a successfully smuggling it through to prove it came through in a bag of 2 goods.
